description.title: Weekly Goals
description.description: Each week, steadily reduce careless errors by refining accuracy in both Math and Reading & Writing. Achieve measurable improvement in reasoning skills related to inferences, boundaries, transitions, and rhetorical synthesis in Reading & Writing, while strengthening mastery of equivalent expressions, area and volume, ratios and rates, linear equations, and geometry concepts in Math. Maintain consistent progress by pushing beyond comfort zones with progressively challenging problems under moderate time constraints, ensuring improved cognitive flexibility and strategic application.

description.title: Math
description: Ratios, rates, proportional relationships, and units

description.Inferences: Practice timed sets of inference questions where you must identify implicit meanings within short passages, using a visible countdown to increase urgency and aiming to beat your previous completion time while maintaining accuracy.
description.Boundaries: Work through medium-difficulty boundary questions in timed drills, focusing on identifying paragraph or idea shifts; after each set, analyze errors to adjust strategies and gradually increase difficulty without losing composure.
description.Transitions: Engage in targeted exercises that require selecting appropriate transitional phrases under a strict time limit, tracking your speed and accuracy to foster subtle competition with your own best performance.
description.Rhetorical Synthesis: Complete medium-level synthesis questions that combine multiple rhetorical elements, using progressive time constraints and reviewing mistakes carefully to deepen understanding and improve strategic reading.

description.Equivalent expressions: Solve progressively challenging algebraic problems focused on isolating variables in multi-step equations, using stepwise notation and timed drills with visible countdowns to encourage precision under pressure while verifying solutions by substitution.
description.Area and volume: Practice complex area and volume problems involving composite figures and unit conversions under moderate time limits, emphasizing careful formula selection and step-by-step calculations to minimize errors.
description.Ratios, rates, proportional relationship: Work through medium-difficulty ratio and proportion problems with timed sets, incorporating unit conversion challenges and cross-multiplication exercises to build fluency and speed while tracking improvement.
description.Linear equations in one variable: Engage in timed practice of multi-step linear equations and inequalities, focusing on maintaining balance in operations and correctly flipping inequality signs, with performance reviews to identify and correct recurring mistakes.
description.Lines, angles, and triangles: Tackle the most difficult geometry problems involving congruence, similarity, and angle relationships under timed conditions, practicing speed optimization and accuracy with self-competition to improve response time without sacrificing calmness.

description.title: Weekly Structure
description.description: Each weekday includes focused dual-skill practice sessions pairing one Math and one Reading & Writing skill, starting the week with your weakest areas to build momentum, midweek targeting moderate skills for reinforcement, and Fridays dedicated to reviewing errors and adapting strategies. Saturdays are reserved for one full-length practice test under timed conditions, followed by a thorough review to understand mistakes and refine approaches. Sundays serve as a Flex Day to rest and recalibrate, supporting sustained progress and cognitive flexibility.

description.title: Flex Day Activities
description.description: Use Flex Days to reflect calmly on recent errors by journaling insights without pressure, experiment with new study tools or techniques to discover what subtly enhances your focus, engage in mixed-skill challenges at a relaxed pace to maintain cognitive agility, incorporate mindfulness or light physical activity to recharge mentally and physically, and set clear, achievable goals for the upcoming week to maintain quiet confidence and steady growth.
